snippet: The federal government should set baseline environmental safety standards for hydraulic fracturing.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Jody Freeman, a former White House counselor for energy and climate change, calls for a system of federal oversight that will promote confidence in the hydraulic fracturing process and will provide the industry with uniform standards without overregulating it.
lead_paragraph: The federal government should set baseline environmental safety standards for hydraulic fracturing.

headline.seo: The Wise Way to Regulate Hydraulic Fracturing
